name: Smolov Jr. 3-Week High Volume Blast
time_per_session_breakdown: 6-10 sets per session, ~60-90 min incl. rests
overview_and_execution: 4 workouts weekly for one lift. Ex: 6×6@70%, 7×5@75%, 8×4@80%, 10×3@85%. Each week add 5-10 lb. After 3 weeks, test a new max.
important_notes: High volume specialization. Very taxing. Emphasize recovery. Typically done for squat or bench only.
volume_metrics: Example: 6×6 + 7×5 + 8×4 + 10×3 = 154 reps in a single week
